description: Fundaci√≥n Pan Vivo focuses on addressing the food needs of vulnerable populations in the area. Recognizing that meeting basic needs is essential for breaking the cycle of poverty, the foundation operates a community canteen and solidarity markets. These services not only provide meals but also include therapeutic support and skill-building activities to empower individuals, particularly older adults, youth, and children. The foundation encourages participation in educational programs by offering meals as an incentive, fostering a supportive environment where beneficiaries can also engage in artistic pursuits and community development. With a strong emphasis on sustainability, the foundation has established partnerships with local businesses and aims to expand its reach, demonstrating a commitment to long-term impact and community resilience.
name: Pan Vivo
